meanings.definition: A group or set of nine.
meanings.sent1: The ennead of colorful balloons floated in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She collected an ennead of seashells during her beach vacation.
meanings.sent3: The ennead of puppies caused chaos in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The ennead of stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The ennead of books on the shelf caught her eye.

meanings.definition: A nine-day period of mourning after a death.
meanings.sent1: During the ennead, family and friends gathered to honor the deceased.
meanings.sent2: The ennead provided time for reflection and remembrance.
meanings.sent3: The ennead brought the community together in support.
meanings.sent4: The ennead felt like a never-ending cycle of sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The ennead of candles flickered in the dimly lit room.
